params.name: CONNECT
params.desc_key: Indicate whether the tests are configured for Sauce Connect.

execution.shell:
#!/bin/bash
set +x
set +e 
export INIT_START_TIME=$(date +"%s")

export SAUCE_USERNAME=#USER_ID#
export SAUCE_ACCESS_KEY=#ACCESS#
        
. $EXT_DIR/_init.sh
INIT_END_TIME=$(date +"%s")
INIT_EST_TIME=$(($INIT_END_TIME-$INIT_START_TIME))
echo -e "Init runtime of `date -u -d @"$INIT_EST_TIME" +'%-Mm %-Ss'`"

sauce_connect=#CONNECT#
if [[ $sauce_connect ]]; then
    echo "Setting up Sauce Connect..."
    export HOST="localhost"
    export PORT=4445
    wget https://saucelabs.com/downloads/sc-4.3.10-linux.tar.gz
    tar -xf sc-4.3.10-linux.tar.gz
    cd sc-4.3.10-linux
    bin/sc -u $SAUCE_USERNAME -k $SAUCE_ACCESS_KEY &
    cd ..
    sleep 15
else
    export HOST="ondemand.saucelabs.com"
    export PORT=80
fi
        
dropdown_choice="#SELECT_CMD#"

if [[ $dropdown_choice == "npm test" ]] || [[ $dropdown_choice == "grunt test" ]] || [[ $dropdown_choice == "grunt" ]]; then
    npm install
    eval #SELECT_CMD#
    RESULT=$?
    ${EXT_DIR}/sauce.py
    PY_RES=$?
    if [ $RESULT -ne 0 ] || [$PY_RES -ne 0 ]; then
        exit 1
    fi
fi
if [[ $dropdown_choice == "ant test" ]] || [[ $dropdown_choice == "mvn test" ]]; then
    eval #SELECT_CMD#
    RESULT=$?
    ${EXT_DIR}/sauce.py
    PY_RES=$?
    if [ $RESULT -ne 0 ] || [$PY_RES -ne 0 ]; then
        exit 1
    fi
fi
if [[ $dropdown_choice == "custom" ]]; then
    /bin/bash -e #COMMAND#
    ${EXT_DIR}/sauce.py
    PY_RES=$?
    if [$PY_RES -ne 0 ]; then
        exit 1
    fi
fi
